oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Highly resistive body STI Ndemos : an optimized demos device to achieve moving current filaments for robust ESD protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SHRIVASTAVA, M
SCHNEIDER, J
BAGHINI, MS
GOSSNER, H
RAO, VR
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A novel DeMOS device with modified body and source region in grounded gate (gg) NMOS configuration for ESD protection is proposed. Detailed 3D simulations indicate a high failure threshold because of moving current filaments and self-protection from gate oxide breakdown, even for fast transients. A detailed physics of second basepushout and moving filaments is discussed
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: 2009 IEEE INTERNATIONAL RELIABILITY PHYSICS SYMPOSIUM, VOLS 1 AND 2,754-759
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 47th Annual IEEE International Reliability Physics Symposium,Montreal, CANADA,APR 26-30, 2009
